title: Vizhiyae Vizhiyae Lyrics Idhu Kathirvelan Kadhal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Vizhiyae Vizhiyae
Singers: Aalaap Raju
Movie: Idhu Kathirvelan Kadhal
Music: Harrish Jeyaraaj
Lyrics: Thamarai

Vizhiyae Vizhiyae thirai virigirathey
unnai paarthidum velayiley
Adhiley adhile padam varaigiradhey
manam serndhidum aasaigale.

Kadhiravanaaga prindha pagal
nilavena thaeyavum thunidhadhadi.
Karuniramaaga irundha nizhal
unadhiru paarvayil veluththadi.

Anabae unnai paarpadhum anubavame
unnaal uyir povadhum sugam sugame. (2)

Edhai nee sonnaalum viyappen
un azhagai kaiyendhi rasippen
Edhai nee sonnaalum viyappen
un azhagai kaiyendhi rasippen

adam ne seidhaalum poruppen
un kuralai cell phonil padhippen
pozhudhum unnodu iruppen
pun sirippil sombalgal murippen
Edhai nee sonnaalum viyappen
un azhagai kaiyendhi rasippen

Ilayum theendaadha kani nee
naan suvaikkum naal kittum poru nee
viralgal meettaadha isai ne
mellisaiyaai en kadhal vasam nee
thavame seiyaadha varam nee
pen kadale muththangal idu nee
Ilayum theendaadha kani nee
naan suvaikkum naal kittum poru nee

Vizhiyae Vizhiyae thirai virigirathey
unnai paarthidum velayiley
Adhiley adhile padam varaigiradhey
manam serndhidum aasaigale.

Kadhiravanaaga prindha pagal
nilavena thaeyavum thunidhadhadi.
Karuniramaaga irundha nizhal
unadhiru paarvayil veluththadi.

Anabae unnai paarpadhum anubavame
unnaal uyir povadhum sugam sugame.(2)
